languages.text: {n}Удрученное молчание повисает в воздухе. Наконец Леди-Навигатор произносит:{/n} "Правда, Лорд-капитан. Признаться, меня уже многие годы преследуют странные фигуры — во снах, во время видений и прозрения варпа. Они тянутся ко мне, изнемогают, что-то кричат, но слов я не слышу. А одна из фигур, самая устрашающая, все время стоит поодаль и лишь осудительно смотрит".

traits.locale_text: {n}Удрученное молчание повисает в воздухе. Наконец Леди-Навигатор произносит:{/n} "Правда, Лорд-капитан. Признаться, меня уже многие годы преследуют странные фигуры — во снах, во время видений и прозрения варпа. Они тянутся ко мне, изнемогают, что-то кричат, но слов я не слышу. А одна из фигур, самая устрашающая, все время стоит поодаль и лишь осудительно смотрит".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}A dejected silence hangs in the air. Finally, the Lady Navigator says,{/n} "It was real, Lord Captain. I must confess, I have been hounded by eerie strangers for many years — in my dreams, visions, and warp scryings. They try to reach me. They are tormented. They shout something I cannot make out. And one of those strangers, the most frightening one, is a woman who always stands aside and merely looks on in disapproval."

languages.text: {n}空气中弥漫着死一般的沉默，到最后，卡西娅开了口。{/n}“那些都是真的，舰长大人。我必须承认，这么多年来，无论是在梦境、幻景，还是在亚空间中，那些诡异的陌生人一直都在困扰着我。他们想要接近我，他们遭到了折磨，他们喊着我听不明白的话语。在那群陌生人之中，最令我惧怕的是个妇人，而她仅仅是站在一旁，以不满的眼神看着这一切。”
languages.original_text: {n}A dejected silence hangs in the air. Finally, the Lady Navigator says,{/n} "It was real, Lord Captain. I must confess, I have been hounded by eerie strangers for many years — in my dreams, visions, and warp scryings. They try to reach me. They are tormented. They shout something I cannot make out. And one of those strangers, the most frightening one, is a woman who always stands aside and merely looks on in disapproval."

traits.locale_text: {n}空气中弥漫着死一般的沉默，到最后，卡西娅开了口。{/n}“那些都是真的，舰长大人。我必须承认，这么多年来，无论是在梦境、幻景，还是在亚空间中，那些诡异的陌生人一直都在困扰着我。他们想要接近我，他们遭到了折磨，他们喊着我听不明白的话语。在那群陌生人之中，最令我惧怕的是个妇人，而她仅仅是站在一旁，以不满的眼神看着这一切。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

I must confess, I have been hounded by eerie strangers for many years — in my dreams, visions, and warp scryings. They try to reach me. They are tormented. They shout something I cannot make out. And one of those strangers, the most frightening one, is a woman who always stands aside and merely looks on in disapproval."

languages.text: {n}Un silencio desconsolado impregna el aire. Por fin, la Lady Navegante habla:{/n} «Era real, Lord Capitán. Debo confesar que veo a desconocidos espeluznantes desde hace años, en mis sueños, en mis visiones y al escudriñar la disformidad. Intentan alcanzarme. Están atormentados. Gritan algo que no alcanzo a entender. Y luego hay otra desconocida, la que más miedo me da, que se limita a observar con desaprobación desde los laterales».
languages.original_text: {n}A dejected silence hangs in the air. Finally, the Lady Navigator says,{/n} "It was real, Lord Captain. I must confess, I have been hounded by eerie strangers for many years — in my dreams, visions, and warp scryings. They try to reach me. They are tormented. They shout something I cannot make out. And one of those strangers, the most frightening one, is a woman who always stands aside and merely looks on in disapproval."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silencio desconsolado impregna el aire. Por fin, la Lady Navegante habla:{/n} «Era real, Lord Capitán. Debo confesar que veo a desconocidos espeluznantes desde hace años, en mis sueños, en mis visiones y al escudriñar la disformidad. Intentan alcanzarme. Están atormentados. Gritan algo que no alcanzo a entender. Y luego hay otra desconocida, la que más miedo me da, que se limita a observar con desaprobación desde los laterales».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}消沈したような沈黙が漂う。ついに、航宙士が口を開いた。{/n}「あれは現実でした、ロード・キャプテン。正直に言うと、私は何年も不気味な見知らぬ人たちに悩まされてきました。夢の中でも、ビジョンの中でも、歪みのスクライイングの中でも。彼らは私に近づこうとする。彼らは私を苦しめる。彼らは私が聞き取れない何かを叫ぶ。そして、その見知らぬ人たちのうちの一人、最も恐ろしいのは、いつも脇に立ってただ眺めているだけの女性でした」
languages.original_text: {n}A dejected silence hangs in the air. Finally, the Lady Navigator says,{/n} "It was real, Lord Captain. I must confess, I have been hounded by eerie strangers for many years — in my dreams, visions, and warp scryings. They try to reach me. They are tormented. They shout something I cannot make out. And one of those strangers, the most frightening one, is a woman who always stands aside and merely looks on in disapproval."

traits.locale_text: {n}消沈したような沈黙が漂う。ついに、航宙士が口を開いた。{/n}「あれは現実でした、ロード・キャプテン。正直に言うと、私は何年も不気味な見知らぬ人たちに悩まされてきました。夢の中でも、ビジョンの中でも、歪みのスクライイングの中でも。彼らは私に近づこうとする。彼らは私を苦しめる。彼らは私が聞き取れない何かを叫ぶ。そして、その見知らぬ人たちのうちの一人、最も恐ろしいのは、いつも脇に立ってただ眺めているだけの女性でした」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein niedergeschlagenes Schweigen hängt in der Luft. Schließlich sagt die Navigatorin:{/n} "Es war echt, Lord Captain. Ich muss gestehen, ich werde seit vielen Jahren von unheimlichen Fremden gejagt ... in meinen Träumen, Visionen und Warp-Wahrsagereien. Sie versuchen, mich zu erreichen. Sie werden gepeinigt. Sie rufen etwas, was ich nicht ausmachen kann. Und eine dieser Fremden, die furchterregendste, ist eine Frau, die immer etwas abseits steht und nur missbilligend zusieht."
languages.original_text: {n}A dejected silence hangs in the air. Finally, the Lady Navigator says,{/n} "It was real, Lord Captain. I must confess, I have been hounded by eerie strangers for many years — in my dreams, visions, and warp scryings. They try to reach me. They are tormented. They shout something I cannot make out. And one of those strangers, the most frightening one, is a woman who always stands aside and merely looks on in disapproval."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein niedergeschlagenes Schweigen hängt in der Luft. Schließlich sagt die Navigatorin:{/n} "Es war echt, Lord Captain. Ich muss gestehen, ich werde seit vielen Jahren von unheimlichen Fremden gejagt ... in meinen Träumen, Visionen und Warp-Wahrsagereien. Sie versuchen, mich zu erreichen. Sie werden gepeinigt. Sie rufen etwas, was ich nicht ausmachen kann. Und eine dieser Fremden, die furchterregendste, ist eine Frau, die immer etwas abseits steht und nur missbilligend zusieht."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un silence abattu s'installe. Au bout d'un certain temps, la navigatrice se décide enfin à répondre.{/n} « C'était on ne peut plus réel, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je dois avouer que cela fait bien des années que je suis harcelée par d'étranges inconnus, que ce soit dans mes rêves, mes visions ou mes prédictions dans le Warp. Ils essaient de m'atteindre. Ils sont tourmentés. Ils crient des choses que je n'arrive pas à comprendre. Et l'un de ces inconnus, le plus effrayant de tous, est une femme qui se contente de m'observer avec un air désapprobateur. »
languages.original_text: {n}A dejected silence hangs in the air. Finally, the Lady Navigator says,{/n} "It was real, Lord Captain. I must confess, I have been hounded by eerie strangers for many years — in my dreams, visions, and warp scryings. They try to reach me. They are tormented. They shout something I cannot make out. And one of those strangers, the most frightening one, is a woman who always stands aside and merely looks on in disapproval."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silence abattu s'installe. Au bout d'un certain temps, la navigatrice se décide enfin à répondre.{/n} « C'était on ne peut plus réel, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je dois avouer que cela fait bien des années que je suis harcelée par d'étranges inconnus, que ce soit dans mes rêves, mes visions ou mes prédictions dans le Warp. Ils essaient de m'atteindre. Ils sont tourmentés. Ils crient des choses que je n'arrive pas à comprendre. Et l'un de ces inconnus, le plus effrayant de tous, est une femme qui se contente de m'observer avec un air désapprobateur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ortama kederli bir sessizlik düşüyor. En sonunda Leydi Rotacı söze giriyor.{/n} "Gerçekti Lord Kaptan. İtiraf etmeliyim ki tekinsiz yabancılar bana musallat olmaya başlayalı seneler oldu... Rüyalarımda, görülerimde ve öteboyut keşiflerimde peşimdeler. Bana ulaşmaya çalışıyorlar. Izdırap içindeler. Anlam veremediğim bir şeyler haykırıyorlar. Bu yabancıların içinden en korkunç olanı da daima kenarda durup sadece beni kınarcasına süzen bir kadın."
languages.original_text: {n}A dejected silence hangs in the air. Finally, the Lady Navigator says,{/n} "It was real, Lord Captain. I must confess, I have been hounded by eerie strangers for many years — in my dreams, visions, and warp scryings. They try to reach me. They are tormented. They shout something I cannot make out. And one of those strangers, the most frightening one, is a woman who always stands aside and merely looks on in disapproval."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ortama kederli bir sessizlik düşüyor. Nihayet Leydi Rotacı söze giriyor.{/n} "Gerçekti Lord Kaptan. İtiraf etmeliyim ki tekinsiz yabancılar bana musallat olmaya başlayalı seneler oldu... Rüyalarımda, görülerimde ve öteboyut keşiflerimde peşimdeler. Bana ulaşmaya çalışıyorlar. Izdırap içindeler. Anlam veremediğim bir şeyler haykırıyorlar. Bu yabancıların içinden en korkunç olanı da, daima kenarda durup sadece beni kınarcasına süzen bir kadın."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
